detail_desc: Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. High stand-up collar with a zip at the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Sleeve pockets with a flap and concealed press-stud, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long top in soft, ribbed jersey with a wide neckline, dropped shoulders, long sleeves, high slits in the sides and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Ankle-length leggings in jacquard-patterned jersey with a high, elasticated waist and flared hems.

Biker jacket in soft imitation leather with quilted details. Collar with a detachable faux fur layer on top, and press-studs on the lapels. Diagonal zip down the front, zipped side pockets and long sleeves with a zip at the cuffs. Lined.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves.

Oversized hoodie in soft sweatshirt fabric. Rib-trimmed, jersey-lined hood with a drawstring at the front, low dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
5-pocket jeans in stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, slim legs and hard-worn details.
Cotton jersey leggings with sewn-in pin-tucks on the legs and a high elasticated waist.

Top in soft sweatshirt fabric in a relaxed fit with dropped shoulders and long sleeves, each with a decorative flap and concealed press-stud. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Ankle-length joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with a high, elasticated drawstring waist. Side pockets, flap leg pockets with a concealed press-stud, and tapered legs with covered elastication at the hems. Soft brushed inside.
Cardigan in a soft knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and front pockets. No buttons.
Ankle-length trousers in soft jersey with an elasticated waist, side pockets and gently tapered legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Top in soft viscose jersey with a slight sheen and visible seams. Slightly wider neckline, short sleeves and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Jumper in loose-knit tape yarn with a slightly wider neckline, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Ankle-length trousers in soft jersey with an elasticated waist, side pockets and gently tapered legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Ankle-length treggings in washed denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and two open back pockets. Tapered legs with patterned side stripes.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs.
Oversized top in cotton sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cardigan in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, side pockets and raw edges at the cuffs and hem. No fasteners.
Long-sleeved top in a fine knit with a sightly wider neckline and rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Trousers in jersey containing shimmering metallic threads. High waist with covered elastication, and wide, flared hems.

Ankle-length jumpsuit in jersey containing glittery threads with a V-neck front and back, a concealed press-stud at the front and narrow, elastic shoulder straps. Elasticated seam and a detachable tie belt at the waist and straight, wide legs.
Jazz trousers in ribbed jersey with a slight sheen. High waist with concealed elastication, and straight-cut legs with flared hems.
Short, gently tailored dungaree dress in corduroy with adjustable shoulder straps, buttons down the front, a seam at the waist and large patch front pockets.
Trousers in a patterned weave with a high, elasticated waist, concealed zip in one side and straight, wide legs.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a text print motif on the front, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short, wide T-shirt in soft cotton jersey. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.

Pile-lined parka in a cotton weave with padded sleeves, a stand-up collar and pile-lined hood with a detachable faux-fur trim. Zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front, and a drawstring at the waist and hem. Flap front pockets with a press-stud and a concealed pocket behind with a press-stud at the top. Elasticated tab with a concealed press-stud at the cuffs, and a small back vent. Lined.

Pile-lined parka in a cotton weave with padded sleeves, a stand-up collar and pile-lined hood with a detachable faux-fur trim. Zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front, and a drawstring at the waist and hem. Flap front pockets with a press-stud and a concealed pocket behind with a press-stud at the top. Elasticated tab with a concealed press-stud at the cuffs, and a small back vent. Lined.
Top in soft viscose jersey with a slight sheen and visible seams. Slightly wider neckline, short sleeves and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Short skater skirt in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist and visible zip at the back. Unlined.

Short dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck and sewn-in wrapover at the front, 3/4-length sleeves with ties at the cuffs, a seam at the waist with elastication at the back, and a gently flared skirt with a flounce at the front and hem. Unlined.
Set with a cropped tube top and calf-length skirt in sequined, glittery jersey. Top with a concealed silicone trim at the top. Skirt with concealed elastication at the waist. Unlined.

Long, padded parka in cotton twill with a stand-up collar with press-studs, and a lined, padded hood with a foldover edge. Zip and button band with concealed press-studs down the front, handwarmer pockets, flap side pockets with a press stud, and a drawstring at the waist. Concealed inner ribbing at the cuffs and a gently rounded hem. Lined. Polyester filling.
Short, A-line skirt in a patterned cotton weave with buttons down the front.

Friendship tops in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with an embroidered motif on the front. Round neckline, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Short, A-line skirt in grained imitation leather. Extended waistband with a button, a diagonal zip down the front, a zipped front pocket and a small, decorative flap with a press-stud at the front. Lined.
Leggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist and contrasting colour stripes down the sides of the legs.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a jersey-lined hood. Deep V-neck with lacing at the front, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Soft brushed inside.

Slightly boxy-style top in patterned sweatshirt fabric with low dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and an elastic drawstring at the hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a jersey-lined hood. Deep V-neck with lacing at the front, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Soft brushed inside.
Leggings in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and a regular waist with covered elastication.
High-waisted jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details, a zip fly and button, back pockets and skinny legs.
Short, A-line skirt with a high waist and buttons down the front.
Cardigan in a soft cable knit with a deep V-neck and buttons down the front. Long raglan sleeves and patch front pockets.
Top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short, wide T-shirt in soft cotton jersey. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Short, fitted dress in stretch velour with a V-neck, wrapover and long sleeves. Slightly longer at the back.

Short, fitted dress in stretch imitation leather with a diagonal zip down the front, notch lapels with decorative buttons, and 3/4-length sleeves. Detachable, adjustable belt with a metal buckle at the waist. Unlined.
Straight-cut shirt jacket in soft pile with a collar and press-studs down the front. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud, front pockets and long sleeves with press-studs at the cuffs. Unlined.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Straight-style cardigan in a fine-knit viscose blend with low dropped shoulders, 3/4-length sleeves and crocheted lace trims at the cuffs and hem. No buttons.
Long top in soft, ribbed jersey with a wide neckline, dropped shoulders, long sleeves, high slits in the sides and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Top in soft, airy, fine-knit, gently draping fabric with a slightly wider neckline, long sleeves and rounded hem. Longer at the back.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a lined hood with a detachable faux fur trim. Zip and wind flap with hook-and-loop fastening down the front, flap chest and front pockets with a press-stud and two additional zipped front pockets. Concealed drawstring at the waist and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.

Biker jacket in imitation suede with quilted shoulders, a tab with a press-stud at the neck and a diagonal zip down the front. Zipped side pockets, long sleeves with sturdy ribbed jersey undersides and a zip at the cuffs. Lined.
High-waisted jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details, a zip fly and button, back pockets and skinny legs.

Pile-lined parka in a cotton weave with padded sleeves, a stand-up collar and pile-lined hood with a detachable faux-fur trim. Zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front, and a drawstring at the waist and hem. Flap front pockets with a press-stud and a concealed pocket behind with a press-stud at the top. Elasticated tab with a concealed press-stud at the cuffs, and a small back vent. Lined.

Long, padded parka in cotton twill with a stand-up collar with press-studs, and a lined, padded hood with a foldover edge. Zip and button band with concealed press-studs down the front, handwarmer pockets, flap side pockets with a press stud, and a drawstring at the waist. Concealed inner ribbing at the cuffs and a gently rounded hem. Lined. Polyester filling.
Top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jumper in a soft rib knit with a deep V-neck and lacing at the front, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved cardigan in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with raw edges. Jersey-lined hood and patch front pockets. No fasteners.

Short shirt dress in softly draping woven fabric with a sheen. Collar, concealed buttons down the front and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Unlined.
Trousers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, and legs with panels down the sides and elasticated hems.
Short jersey top with a V-neck, decorative buttons down the front and short, wide sleeves. Elastication and a tie detail at the hem.
Short dress in stretch jersey with a small stand-up collar, long sleeves and stripes down the sides.
Cropped top in crinkled, patterned jersey with a sweetheart neckline and short, trimmed puff sleeves with elastication over the shoulders.
Ankle-length trousers in soft jersey with an elasticated waist, side pockets and gently tapered legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Long-sleeved dress in a patterned crêpe weave with a smocked stand-up collar, opening with small buttons at the back of the neck, and a rounded hem.
Long-sleeved cardigan in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with raw edges. Jersey-lined hood and patch front pockets. No fasteners.
Jacket in washed denim with a collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets and buttoned cuffs.
Short T-shirt dress in soft jersey with short cap sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Long cardigan knitted in soft bouclé yarn containing some wool. Long sleeves and no buttons.
Short, gently tailored dungaree dress in corduroy with adjustable shoulder straps, buttons down the front, a seam at the waist and large patch front pockets.
Trousers in cotton twill with a high paper bag waist, zip fly and button and detachable tie belt. Patch front pockets and tapered legs.
Straight-cut jacket in soft jersey with long notch lapels, jetted front pockets and 3/4-length sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. No fasteners. Unlined.
High-waisted jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details, a zip fly and button, back pockets and skinny legs.

Short parka in washed cotton twill with a brushed finish. Drawstring hood, a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, side pockets with a tab and press-stud, a drawstring at the waist and cuffs with press-studs. Slightly longer and rounded at the back. Unlined.
Playsuit in sequined, glittery jersey with spaghetti shoulder straps. V-neck at the front, straight cut at the back, a gathered seam at the waist and short, wide legs.

Short, fitted dress in cotton twill with buttons down the front and a V-neck with a concealed press-stud at the top. Adjustable shoulder straps with large plastic buckles, side pockets with a decorative flap, and a seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt. Unlined.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed denim with hard-worn details, a high waist, button fly and gently tapered legs with raw-edge hems.
Biker jacket in imitation suede with a diagonal zip at the front, side pockets and ribbed jersey sections under the arms. Lined.
Trousers in a viscose weave with an elasticated drawstring waist in a relaxed fit. Pockets in the side seams, a slightly lower crotch, and tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Playsuit in a viscose weave with a V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, elasticated seam at the waist, diagonal side pockets and short legs.
Dungarees in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, adjustable straps and a visible zip at one side. Chest pocket, coin pocket, side pockets and back pockets. Slim, ankle-length legs.
Cardigan in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, side pockets and raw edges at the cuffs and hem. No fasteners.
Short T-shirt dress in soft jersey with short cap sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Off-the-shoulder maxi dress in soft viscose jersey with a heavy drape. Short sleeves, elastication and a wide flounce at the top, an elasticated seam below the bust and gently flared skirt with high slits at the front. Unlined.
Short, fitted dress in stretch velour with a V-neck, wrapover and long sleeves. Slightly longer at the back.

Pile-lined parka in a cotton weave with padded sleeves, a stand-up collar and pile-lined hood with a detachable faux-fur trim. Zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front, and a drawstring at the waist and hem. Flap front pockets with a press-stud and a concealed pocket behind with a press-stud at the top. Elasticated tab with a concealed press-stud at the cuffs, and a small back vent. Lined.
Short, wide T-shirt in soft cotton jersey in a loose fit with low dropped shoulders, short sleeves and ribbing around the neckline.
Long-sleeved dress in chiffon crêpe with a V-neck, buttons at the front and a gently tapered waist with a gathered seam. Unlined.
Short, A-line skirt with a high waist and buttons down the front.
Fitted dress in a viscose weave with a checked pattern, shoulder straps and a concealed zip in one side. Unlined.
Straight-cut jacket in soft jersey with long notch lapels, jetted front pockets and 3/4-length sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. No fasteners. Unlined.
Short dress in sturdy viscose jersey in a narrow cut at the top with wide shoulder straps that cross at the back and a seam at the waist. Unlined.
Short, A-line skirt in a patterned cotton weave with buttons down the front.
Cardigan in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, diagonal zip at the front and long sleeves with decorative stitching at the elbows. Side pockets, ribbed cuffs and a raw-edge hem.
Ankle-length dungarees in washed denim with hard-worn details. Adjustable straps, a chest pocket, side pockets and back pockets. Buttons at the sides and gently tapered legs with raw-edge hems.
Short skirt in woven fabric with flounces. Elastication at the back of the waist and a sewn-in tie belt. Unlined.

Long parka in woven fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood and a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front. Side pockets with a press-stud, long raglan sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and a drawstring at the waist and hem. Lined.
Short dress in an airy, patterned crêpe weave with a V-neck, buttons down the front and short puff sleeves with narrow, covered elastication. Seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Dress in an airy viscose crêpe weave with lace details. V-neck with twisted ties at the top, cap sleeves, and a seam at the waist and on the skirt. Unlined.

Short parka in washed cotton twill with a stand-up collar and drawstring hood. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, side pockets with a press-stud, a drawstring at the waist and a press-stud at the cuffs. Slightly longer and rounded at the back. Unlined.

Short parka in washed cotton twill with a drawstring hood, zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, and press-studs at the cuffs. Side pockets with a press-stud, and a drawstring at the waist. Unlined.

Short dress in a patterned crêpe weave with a V-neck and sewn-in wrapover at the front. 3/4-length sleeves with ties at the cuffs, an elasticated seam at the waist, and a gently flared skirt with a wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.

Short dress in woven fabric with embroidered details, a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front and wide, 3/4-length sleeves. Elasticated seam at the waist and scalloped edges around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Partly lined in jersey.
Ankle-length trousers in soft jersey with an elasticated waist, side pockets and gently tapered legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Jumper in a soft rib knit with a deep V-neck and lacing at the front, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short dress in a patterned weave with a round neckline, long sleeves, a gathered seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in an airy plumeti weave with a V-neck, frilled shoulder straps and long sleeves. Flounces with an embroidered trim at the front, and elastication at the cuffs. Lined.
Straight-cut shirt dress in a softly draping, patterned weave with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke at the back. Low dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.

Short parka in washed cotton twill with a brushed finish. Drawstring hood, a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, side pockets with a tab and press-stud, a drawstring at the waist and cuffs with press-studs. Slightly longer and rounded at the back. Unlined.
5-pocket shorts in sturdy denim with hard-worn details, a button fly and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Short, smocked, off-the-shoulder top in cotton jersey with short sleeves and overlocked edges.
Trousers in an airy viscose weave with an elasticated waist, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Short, A-line skirt with a high waist and buttons down the front.

Wide, boxy jacket in washed denim with a collar, buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets and a tab with adjustable buttoning at the sides of the hem.
Biker jacket in imitation suede with a diagonal zip at the front, side pockets and ribbed jersey sections under the arms. Lined.
Trousers in a viscose weave with an elasticated drawstring waist in a relaxed fit. Pockets in the side seams, a slightly lower crotch, and tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in airy, striped, crinkled viscose with narrow elastication, a flounce and an opening with ties at the top. Short sleeves with flounced trims.
Vest top in patterned cotton jersey.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Short coat in woven fabric with a patterned lining. Wrapover front with draped lapels and a concealed press-stud, pockets in the side seams, a detachable tie belt at the waist and a single back vent. Lined.

Fitted, knee-length dress in a crêpe weave with a slightly wider neckline and long sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs. Seam at the waist with a knot detail at the front and elastication at the back. Unlined.
Ankle-length jersey trousers with a regular, elasticated waist, side pockets and gently tapered legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Vest top in patterned cotton jersey.
Short dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a scallop-edged V-neck, decorative buttons at the front, short sleeves and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Short dress in a viscose weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Seam and a tie belt at the waist and long sleeves with a tab and button. Unlined.
Long-sleeved dress in a patterned crêpe weave with a smocked stand-up collar, opening with small buttons at the back of the neck, and a rounded hem.

Knee-length trenchcoat in a woven modal blend with notch lapels and 3/4-length sleeves with a tab and decorative button at the cuffs. Front pockets, a detachable tie belt at the waist and slits in the sides. Unlined.

Short wrap dress in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar, V-neck at the front and an opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck. Elasticated seam at the waist and long trumpet sleeves. Lined.

Fitted body in patterned jersey with a deep, flounce-trimmed neckline at the front and narrow, flounce-trimmed shoulder straps that are elasticated at the back. Concealed press-studs at the crotch. Unlined.
Long-sleeved body in patterned velour with a deep opening at the back, hook-and-eye fasteners at the back of the neck and press-studs at the crotch.

Block-coloured nylon windbreaker with a high stand-up collar, zip down the front and concealed front pockets with a press-stud. Wide dolman sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and an elasticated hem. Lined.
Straight-cut shirt in imitation leather with a collar, press-studs down the front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves, cuffs with press-studs, and a rounded hem.

Straight-style blouse in an airy weave with flock-print spots. Small opening with a button at the back of the neck, long, wide sleeves with gathers at the shoulders and narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs, and a straight hem.
Cardigan in a soft, loose, textured knit with 3/4-length sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. No buttons.

Blouse in an airy, floral-print weave with a high, smocked collar and a yoke with a frill at the front that continues over the shoulders. Long, wide sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a jersey-lined hood. Deep V-neck with lacing at the front, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Soft brushed inside.

Dress in an airy, floral-print weave with a small, frilled collar, opening with a button at the back of the neck, and long, wide sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs. Gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt with a wide flounce at the hem. Lined.
5-pocket ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, zip fly and button and super-skinny legs with uneven, raw-edge hems.

Short-sleeved boiler suit in hard-washed denim made from a cotton blend with a collar, buttons at the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Open chest pocket, patch front pockets, a detachable tie belt at the waist and straight, ankle-length legs with wide elastication at the hems.
Maxi dress in airy chiffon with a V-neck front and back, narrow shoulder straps, an elasticated seam at the waist and a long skirt with high slits in the sides. Lined.
Straight-cut blouse in an airy viscose weave with a stand-up collar and an opening with buttons at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs.

Biker jacket in imitation suede with quilted shoulders, a tab with a press-stud at the neck and a diagonal zip down the front. Zipped side pockets, long sleeves with sturdy ribbed jersey undersides, and a zip at the cuffs. Lined.
Maxi dress in airy chiffon with a V-neck front and back, narrow shoulder straps, an elasticated seam at the waist and a long skirt with high slits in the sides. Lined.
Short dress in a patterned weave with a round neckline, long sleeves, a gathered seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Straight-cut shirt in a soft viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Short dress in stretch jersey with a V-neck and wrapover front with a concealed press-stud. Short cap sleeves and a narrow, elasticated seam at the waist and hem.
Cardigan in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, diagonal zip at the front and long sleeves with decorative stitching at the elbows. Side pockets, ribbed cuffs and a raw-edge hem.
Ankle-length trousers in a patterned, crinkled weave with a high, elasticated waist, side pockets and high slits at the hems.

Long parka in woven fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood and a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front. Side pockets with a press-stud, long raglan sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and a drawstring at the waist and hem. Lined.
Jumper in loose-knit tape yarn with a slightly wider neckline, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Dress in a crinkled weave with a V-neck, wrapover front with ties at the waist and short sleeves with a slit and ties. Calf-length at the back and shorter at the front. Unlined.
Short, fitted off-the-shoulder top in a cotton weave with narrow, covered elastication at the shoulders, smocking at the back and short puff sleeves.
Ribbed top in an airy viscose blend with a V-neck, lacing at the front, dropped shoulders and short sleeves.
Leggings in sturdy jersey with a slight sheen. Elasticated waist and flared legs.
Calf-length skirt in an airy, patterned viscose weave with a high waist that is elasticated at the back and has ties at the front. Longer at the back. Unlined.

Short parka in washed cotton twill with a soft brushed finish. Drawstring hood, a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and flap front pockets with a press-stud. Drawstring at the waist, and cuffs with a press-stud fastening. Slightly longer and rounded at the back. Unlined.
Cardigan in a soft, fine knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a detachable tie belt at the waist. No buttons.
Long-sleeved dress in a patterned crêpe weave with a smocked stand-up collar, opening with small buttons at the back of the neck, and a rounded hem.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves.
Trousers in a soft viscose weave with an elasticated drawstring waist in a relaxed fit. Pockets in the side seams, a slightly lower crotch, and tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Short dress in a viscose weave with lace trims. V-neck opening at the top, a round neckline with twisted ties and 3/4-length balloon sleeves with narrow cuffs. Unlined.
Short, 5-pocket shorts in washed denim with a high waist and raw-edge, cut-off hems.
Sleeveless jumpsuit in soft viscose jersey with a deep neckline at the back, elasticated seam at the waist, side pockets and tapered, ankle-length legs.
Jumper in loose-knit tape yarn with a slightly wider neckline, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Longer and rounded at the back.
Long top in soft, ribbed jersey with a wide neckline, dropped shoulders, long sleeves, high slits in the sides and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Leggings in sturdy cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Jacket in washed denim with a collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets and buttoned cuffs.
Top in soft viscose jersey with a slight sheen and visible seams. Slightly wider neckline, short sleeves and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.

Double-breasted trenchcoat in an airy modal blend with notch lapels, a detachable tie belt at the waist and side pockets. Long sleeves with a tab and button at the cuffs, a loose yoke at the back and a single back vent. Unlined.
5-pocket shorts in sturdy denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, zip fly and raw-edge hems.
Short, gently tailored dungaree dress in corduroy with adjustable shoulder straps, buttons down the front, a seam at the waist and large patch front pockets.
Biker jacket in pile with imitation suede details, a large collar with double tabs and a zip down the front. Welt side pockets. Lined.

Short parka in washed cotton twill with a stand-up collar and drawstring hood. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, side pockets with a press-stud, a drawstring at the waist and a press-stud at the cuffs. Slightly longer and rounded at the back. Unlined.
Long T-shirt in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Short, sleeveless dress in jersey with a seam at the waist and gently flared skirt. Unlined. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.

Blouse in an airy cotton weave with a square neckline front and back, a seam under the bust and smocking at the back. Elastication and a small frill trim over the shoulders and 3/4-length puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the top and wide smocking at the cuffs. Jersey lining at the front.
Sleeveless blouse in a crinkled viscose weave with a V-neck and sewn-in wrapover at the front, wide flounce at the front that continues over the shoulders, and an elasticated hem.
Short dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck and wrapover front with concealed press-studs. Short sleeves and a seam at the waist with a sewn-in tie belt.

Long parka in woven fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood and a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front. Side pockets with a press-stud, long raglan sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and a drawstring at the waist and hem. Lined.
5-pocket, low-rise shorts in washed denim with hard-worn details, a button fly and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Short shorts in a viscose crêpe weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and decorative lace trims at the front and hems.
Parka woven in a modal blend with a soft, brushed finish. Hood, diagonal zip down the front, a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and long sleeves with a tab and button. Unlined.
Jacket in washed denim with a collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets and buttoned cuffs.

Kangol x H&M. Knee-length, padded puffer jacket with a stand-up collar, padded hood, two-way zip down the front and welt pockets at the top. Long sleeves, one with the Kangol logo at the top, and concealed elastication at the cuffs. Recycled polyester lining.

Kangol x H&M. Oversized shirt jacket in sturdy twill with a brushed finish. Collar, buttons down the front, and a yoke with a pleat and hanger loop at the back. Welt front pockets and flap chest pockets with a button. One of the chest pockets has a Kangol logo. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Quilted lining made from recycled polyester.
Oversized shirt in a cotton weave with a small collar, buttons down the front and a chest pocket. Dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Joggers in imitation leather. High waist with covered elastication and a drawstring, diagonal front pockets, and covered elastication at the hems.
